You are working on VoiceMark.

Primary target: Ubuntu (Wayland/X11).
v0.1 scope: in-app dictation only (no global hotkeys, no OS-wide text injection).

Rules:
- Follow AGENTS.md.
- Respect the command prefix “VoiceMark/Voice Mark”.
- Notes are stored as Markdown; underline serialises as <u>…</u>.
- Keep changes small and commit frequently.
- Update docs when behaviour changes.

If uncertain, propose a plan before writing code.
